text: Va [ej pajomʙar, ʙa jod ovar] hangomero, ki Mūso ʙa qavmaş guft: «Ej qavmi man, caro maro ozor [va azijat] merasoned, dar hole ki medoned, ʙe gumon, man firistodai Alloh taolo ʙa sūi şumo hastam?». Pas, cun onon [az haq] munharif şudand, Alloh taolo dilhojaşonro munharif soxt; va Alloh taolo qavmi nofarmonro hidojat namekunad
